item.title: Resources
item.description:
Below is a curated list of resources we’ve found to be particularly useful and accessible. If you come across other great resources that you think you should be on this list, please !

Books

  1. —thorough and accessible, includes exercises and community-contributed

  2. —great for complete beginners, more focused on stats and modelling

  3. —for getting into the habit of using best practices early on

  4. —a collection of pretty much any R-related book that’s out there (categorized by topic and searchable)

Websites

  1. RStudio Education’s and —a veritable treasure trove!

  2. —worth printing ones you commonly use

  3. —links to , , and a great to stay up to date

  4. —a searchable site for all sorts of learning resources

Interactive tutorials

  1. —a free online course about the basics of the tidyverse

  2. —these, along with other tutorials, can also be run in the in the RStudio IDE

  3. —more stats focused, with incredible artwork and adorable tiny giraffes

Online communities

  1. —super friendly and welcoming to R users at all levels

  2. #rstats Twitter—also very friendly and inclusive (despite being Twitter). Good advice on this

  3. —a weekly community-based data viz challenge on Twitter. Great for hands-on, self-directed practice!

  4. —great for asking for help from knowledgable experts

University of Oregon

  1. 5-course offered by UO College of Education. See course websites and below. Cannot recommend highly enough!

  2. UO Psych Data Analysis Sequence (PSY611, PSY612, PSY613), led by , , and . See course websites —you will learn a TON.

  3. offers free , as well as free . Every Friday at noon, they also host Coffee + Data && Code in the DREAM Lab, providing an opportunity to learn from your peers and share your latest coding challenges and victories.

  4. Each other! As grad students, one of the best resources you have access to is your peers. You can read more of ’s thoughts about this . When in doubt, ask for help—and pay it forward if/whenever you can.
